page.title: 16WEST COKER AREA EDUCATION
page.content: WEST COKER PRIMARY SCHOOL THE ONLY SCHOOL IN OUR AREA IS AT WEST COKER.IT IS A SMALL SCHOOL WITH ABOUT 70 CHILDREN.THE SCHOOL HAS 3 CLASES WITH 3 FULL TIME TEACHERS,1 PART TIME TEACHER.WE HAVE SOME PARENT HELPERS. WE NORMALLY HAVE ASSEMBLY AFTER 9 O'CLOCK,AND THEN DO MATHS OR ENGLISH IN THE MORNING. IN THE AFTERNOONS WE DO HISTORY,GEOGRAPHY,ART,SCIENCE,R.E., DRAMA,P.E.,AND MUSIC. WE ALSO GO SWIMMING ON WEDNESDAY MORNINGS. AFTER SCHOOL YOU CAN DO COUNTRY DANCING,RECORDERS OR GUITARS. IN THE PLAY TIMES WE PLAY LEAPFROG, FOOTBALL, CHASE, CATCH AND WE ALSO DO HANDSTANDS. WHEN YOU ARE 11 YEARS OLD YOU GO TO PRESTON SCHOOL IN YEOVIL BY BUS.
